item.title: Pull request #2239 created
item.description:
First cut at diagrams for JNodes (completes QT4CG-127-01)

Here's my first attempt at diagrams for the 8.4 JNodes section in the Data Model. I haven't tried to integrate them into the specification yet, let's see if we think they're correct and useful first. Comments welcome.

  1. I've only put labels (R, M1, J1, etc.) on the nodes where they seem useful
  2. The arrows are the dm:j-children. I've labeled the arrows to show the order.
  3. I haven't tried to add pointers from the nodes back to their parent because I think that will just confuse the diagrams
  4. The diagrams are SVG, but GitHub didn't like that in the PR description so these are ratty looking PNGs

From a JSON parse:

Arbitrary XDM content
